Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Fast Times at UA High
description:
by showtiime

It’s not that Izuku minds being Ochako’s wingman—he’s not the envious type. He loves the girl to pieces, after all, he would do anything to see her smile! If anyone asked, he’d happily inform them that nothing she asks of him is too much.

But talking her up to his childhood friend for prom, who he’s been crushing on since they were kids? That’s asking quite a lot.

Words: 6123, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Midoriya Inko
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Uraraka Ochako
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - No Quirks (My Hero Academia), Prom, Blow Jobs, Pining, Angst, Cheating

summary: Hey! Could you do headcanon for the Bakusquad interacting with fans? Denki's my favorite boi💛💛 Thank youuuu!! Have a wonderful...
question: Hey! Could you do headcanon for the Bakusquad interacting with fans? Denki's my favorite boi💛💛 Thank youuuu!! Have a wonderful day
answer:
I’ve already done some of the bakusquad so I’ll do the ones I’ve left out so far.

Kaminari Denki

  • His fans are really die-hard. Like really wild, and almost all of them are in love with him. He has the teen heart throb thing going on.
  • One time during a press conference with a few other members of grown up class 1-A he stuck a phone charger in his mouth without thinking and the 10 second clip of him doing that has gone viral.
  • When he maxes out his quirk during big battles and turns into a super idiot he wanders around until someone stops him. Fans have encountered him like this and now finding Chargebolt in his burnout state and getting a picture with him is a nationwide meme/game.
  • Nintendo pays him to wear Pikachu merch. Fans lose it when he wears the Pikachu onesie to get Starbucks.
  • He got really drunk one night and now he has a tattoo of an electrical outlet on his ankle.

Ashido Mina

  • She has a massive wlw fan base that is so large she rivals Kirishima, who also has a huge wlw fan base.
  • Mina and Denki discovered that her acid is a really great conductor of electricity so now they team up and use a move called “Acid Lightning” to take down villains.
  • After a much needed costume re-design Mina’s fans started to jokingly send her clothing items that looked like her original costume. She proudly wears most of the outfits in public.
  • A lot of her merch is pink or has a fur lining, but when she was 20 Mina authorized a line of merch that all said “drop acid” but she faced immediate backlash and had to stop selling it. They’re kind of rare though so they sell for a lot online.
  • Once she got big she started her own makeup company that caters exclusively to those with non standard skin tones. She was always tired of having to special order her foundation from costume makeup retailers so she made her own beauty brand.

summary: In honor of Pride Month, I made some My Hero Academia Pride flags with some of the My Hero Academia characters on them(FYI all...
body:
In honor of Pride Month, I made some My Hero Academia Pride flags with some of the My Hero Academia characters on them(FYI all of these are headcanons of mine).

- Yagi Toshinori(All Might) is Homoromantic Bisexual + Polyamorous

- Kugo Sakamata(Gang Orca) is Homoromantic Bisexual + Polyamorous

- All For One is Bisexual

-  Mezo Shoji(Tentacole) - is Homoromantic Bisexual

- Ochaco Uraraka(Uravity) is Bisexual

-  Tsuyu Asui(Froppy) is a Trans Girl + Lesbian

-  Momo Yaoyorozu(Creati) is a Lesbian

-  Kyoka Jiro(Earphone Jack) is a Lesbian

-  Izuku Midoriya(Deku) is Bisexual

-  Shoto Todoroki(Shoto) is Bisexual

-  Eijiro Kirishima(Red Riot) is Bisexual

-  Sekijiro Kan(Vlad King) is Bisexual + Polyamorous

-  Enji Todoroki(Endeavour) is Bisexual + Polyamorous

-  Katsuki Bakugo is Bisexual

blog.description:

☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Such a (Perfect) Brat
description:
by KTG

Kirishima and Bakugou have been together for seven years, and during that time, Kirishima has enjoyed his bratty sugar baby. After witnessing an argument between his baby and his personal kitchen staff, Kirishima decides he needs to be balls deep in his love–and fast.

blog.name: theenigmaofriversong
blog.title: The Long way round
blog.description: Clara sometimes asks me if I dream. Of course I dream, I tell her. Everybody dreams. But what do you dream about, she'll ask. The same thing everybody dreams about, I tell her. I dream about where I'm going. She always laughs at that. But you're not going anywhere, you're just wandering about. That's not true. Not any more. I have a new destination. My journey is the same as yours, the same as anyones. It's taken me so many years, so many lifetimes, but at last I know where I'm going. Where I've always been going. Home...

blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

tags: this one was a wee bit tricky
summary: Hello! It's me! Could I get a quirk analysis for Tsuwari please? He inherited his mothers invisibility quirk where he can turn...
question: Hello! It's me! Could I get a quirk analysis for Tsuwari please? He inherited his mothers invisibility quirk where he can turn invisible at will. He does have a time limit though. He can only go invisible for 3 hrs in the span of 24 hours. He doesn't often reach that limit, but he has before. He loses the ability to use his quirk and he also has extreme muscle fatigue. Tsuwari has a secondary quirk but I'll put that in the next ask lol (1/2)
answer:
(2/2) Tsuwari didn’t know he had a secondary quirk until his villain father kidnapped his mother. The rage triggered his, now mature, hormones and he transformed into an Oni (ogre). The drawback to this quirk is that everytime he transforms back, it is extremely painful and it takes him 38 hours to recover. He hates this quirk and rarely uses it. Hope this is enough info!:) thank you in advance!!!

Hi Kat! I’ve been excited to do this, so I’ll get straight to it.

So my first thought when I looked at Tsuwari’s quirk, with the combo of invisibility *and* the oni transformation, was, “Is it really invisibility per say?” This is because, while each component came from a different parent, they would still have to mix when inherited by Tsuwari. The first thing I thought to look for, were animals capable of metamorphosis, such as the mimic octopus and the cuttlefish, both capable of rendering themselves unseeable via camouflage. While these could explain how Tsuwari could become invisible, there was still the oni transformation to explain. I figure, looking at images of oni, the transformation would entail a strength boost and enhanced durability, so I had to figure out how they would each be possible. Then, I took a look at the puffer fish and the sea cucumber, and it all came together.

To summarize my theory, I believe that Tsuwari’s quirk as a whole is the result of metamorphosis. The invisibility is made possible through the presence of color changing cells called chromatophores in his skin. These are the same kind of cells that allow animals like squid, octopi, and cuttlefish to disguise themselves. His oni transformation, on the other hand, is made possible by a combination of special toxins stored in his body and specially shaped fibrils in his cells. Given that many animals, such as the puffer fish, carry toxins in their bodies, I figure that this quirk grants Tsuwari a special strength enhancement toxin in his body, which would explain the pain from the return to normal. As for durability, I suspect the fibrils (aka thread-like fibers or filaments that are constituent parts of a cell or larger structure) of his cells are identical to that of the sea cucumber, which is what allows the sea cucumber to harden and soften itself.

Thank you so much for sending this in, and have a lovely day!
